tagline: Structures narratives and designs slides that support speakers, turning data dumps into stories that land.
pros: Restructures narrative before touching visuals — the thinking comes first
Expert at deck reduction and one-idea-per-slide discipline
Creates both presentation and leave-behind versions when needed
Designs within actual tool constraints (PowerPoint, Keynote, Slides)
cons: Focused on slide-based storytelling — not a general visual designer
Will push back on slide count and text density, which can feel aggressive
Depends on others for underlying content, data, and custom illustrations

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
